name: Star Citizen
description:
Welcome to the Star Citizen installer maintained by the Star Citizen LUG!

Please make sure to read through the technical instructions in the installer, which are important to prevent game crashes.

For help with the installer or just hang out we invite Linux Star Citizen players to join us: https://robertsspaceindustries.com/orgs/LUG/
notes:
Please make sure you have all Wine dependencies properly installed, else your game may crash during start-up. A good starting point is this post from GloriousEggroll: https://www.gloriouseggroll.tv/how-to-get-out-of-wine-dependency-hell/

Furthermore, to prevent crashes at areas with lots of geometry, the game needs a Linux resource limit named "vm.max_map_count" increased. To do this, execute:

sudo sysctl -w vm.max_map_count=16777216

(Consult your distro's documentation on how to set this permanently, or ask a LUG member)

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Roberts Space Industries/RSI Launcher/RSI Launcher.exe

content:
files:
- client: https://install.robertsspaceindustries.com/star-citizen/RSI-Setup-1.4.0.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Roberts Space Industries/RSI Launcher/RSI Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts vcrun2017 win10
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /S
    description: Installing client
    executable: client
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: '0'
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    nvapi,nvapi64: disabled
  version: lutris-5.5-2-x86_64
